author: Simon Difford
description: Verdant, vibrant, and virtuous - so virtuous that it's saintly! Faintly minty, herbal, and citrusy with whiskey making it a helluva craic.
name: St. Patrick's Day
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Green crème de menthe green
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
